# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8957-102">Svarer i Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8957-103">Å svare på en melding om gangen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f8957-104">I meldingslisten velger du meldingen du vil svare på.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="f8957-105">Øverst til høyre i meldingsruten, velger du</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="f8957-106">**Svar** eller</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="f8957-107">**Svar til alle**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="f8957-108">Skriv inn meldingen, og velg deretter **Send**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8957-109">Svare automatisk på alle meldinger:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f8957-110">gå til</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="f8957-111">**Innstillinger for** > **Vis alle innstillinger i Outlook** > **e-post** > **Automatiske svar** for å åpne [Innstillinger for automatiske svar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="f8957-112">Velg den av / på **Slå på automatiske svar** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="f8957-113">Merke av for **Send svar bare i en tidsperiode** , kan du:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f8957-114">Send svar bare når du velger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="f8957-115">Hvis du ikke angir en tidsperiode, forblir det automatiske svaret på før du slår den av.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f8957-116">Blokk i kalenderen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f8957-117">Avslå automatisk nye invitasjoner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="f8957-118">Avslå og avbryte møter i denne perioden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="f8957-119">I melding-boksen skriver du inn en melding som skal sendes til personer i løpet av tiden du er borte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="f8957-120">Merk av for **Send svar til bare kontakter** for å bare sende svar til kontaktene.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="f8957-121">Velg **Lagre**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8957-122">Lær mer om [automatisk videresending i Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8957-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
